name: MagNet Soul
description:
MagNet Soul

Platformer made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
Uses custom TypeScript engine built during the jam.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move, Z or comma to shoot.
You can also use spacebar to jump if that's easier.

Credits:

Mr. Blue - music, player art, logo art, concept

Gab "Lumbi" Lumbi - programming, design, additional art

Esa "mmKALLL" Koskinen - programming, level design

shoko3168 - programming, additional design

Source code available at: https://github.com/mmKALLL/MagNet-Soul
